thread.title: Intronis Recognized as One of the Worlds Top 100 Cloud Service Providers
thread.title_full: Intronis Recognized as One of the Worlds Top 100 Cloud Service Providers - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Intronis Recognized as One of the Worlds Top 100 Cloud Service Providers
text:
Intronis secures a top 50 spot on the Talkin’ Cloud 100 report for the third year in a row
Chelmsford, Mass. (PRWEB) September 21, 2015
Intronis, Inc. , a provider of world-class backup and data protection solutions for the IT channel, today announced it ranked #49 on Penton’s fifth annual Talkin’ Cloud 100. This is the third year in a row Intronis has earned a top 50 spot on the list, which ranks the industry’s leading 100 cloud-focused computing companies in the IT channel.
“It’s an honor to be recognized as one of the world’s top ranking CSPs and we are proud of our ongoing commitment to the IT channel, as well as to helping our partners achieve success,” says Rick Faulk, CEO of Intronis. “Protecting customer data is a top priority for today’s channel partners, and when delivered as a cloud service, it extends the revenue and profit potential for the MSP, while adding tremendous flexibility, and security in the eyes of the customer.”
According to this year’s Talkin’ Cloud 100 report, which named Salesforce.com, Microsoft, and Amazon Web Services as the top three suppliers, the world’s top 100 CSPs generated more than $30 billion in combined cloud services revenues during 2014, up nearly 29 percent over what they reported the previous year. The full 2015 Talkin’ Cloud 100 report is available at http://www.talkincloud.com/tc100 .
The Talkin’ Cloud 100 list is based on data from Talkin’ Cloud’s online survey, conducted January through May 2015. The Talkin’ Cloud 100 list recognizes top cloud service providers based on such metrics as annual cloud services revenue growth (both in actual dollars and in percentage growth rates), and input from Penton Technology’s Channel editors.
“On behalf of Penton and Talkin' Cloud, I would like to congratulate Intronis for its recognition as a Talkin' Cloud 100 honoree," said Nicole Henderson, Editor in Chief, Talkin' Cloud. “The industry is changing at a rapid pace, and the Talkin’ Cloud 100 companies consistently demonstrate an agility and flexibility that sets them apart. They do so with innovation, via strategic partnerships, and through their commitment to providing superior customer experiences.”
To learn more about Intronis online, follow the channel-friendly cloud backup and recovery innovator on Twitter and LinkedIn , and read the Intronis Cloud Backup and Recovery Blog .
About Intronis
Intronis provides world-class data protection solutions for small businesses, delivered exclusively through the IT channel. The Intronis ECHOplatform securely protects physical and virtual data with native support for physical imaging, VMware, Hyper-V, Exchange, and SQL, all through a re-brandable central management console that integrates with major RMM and PSA tools. With Intronis’ fixed-fee storage pricing per SMB account, IT service providers are able to rapidly grow revenue and scale profit. Through Intronis ECHOshare, channel partners can easily expand their IT services portfolio to include tightly integrated business-grade file sync and share. Learn more at http://www.intronis.com .
